fr.cines.eudat.repopack.b2safe_rp_core

Class DataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cines.eudat.repopack.b2safe_rp_core.DataSet

  • public class DataSet
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the data objects of a repository or a subset of a repository All those data objects have the same replication target. It is necessary to create an instance of this class to start using rp_core features. It uses the properties from the config.properties file to get the replication parameters The class offers methods to launch the replication actions
    Author:
    "S. Coutin (CINES)"

      • replicateOneDO

        public DataObject replicateOneDO(DataObject doToReplicate)
        Replication of one data object from the repository to EUDAT B2SAFE
        Parameters:
        doToReplicate - Description of the data object to replicate in B2SAFE
        Returns:
        Description of the data object with additional information resulting from the replication

      • replicateAllRequestedDO

        public java.util.ArrayList<DataObject> replicateAllRequestedDO(java.util.ArrayList<DataObject> listDOToReplicate)
        Replicate a list of data objects from the repository to EUDAT B2SAFE. It tries to replicate each of the list data objects, even if one replication fails
        Parameters:
        listDOToReplicate -
        Returns:
        The list of data objects with the replication result additional information
        See Also:
        replicateOneDO

      • retrieveOneDOByPath

        public DataObject retrieveOneDOByPath(DataObject dataObject)
        Retrieve a data object (ie a file) from B2SAFE and store it in the repository
        Parameters:
        dataObject - Description of the data object to retrieve, full path on B2SAFE must be provided

      • retrieveListOfDOByPath

        public java.util.ArrayList<DataObject> retrieveListOfDOByPath(java.util.ArrayList<DataObject> listDOToRetrieve)
        Retrieve a list of data object from B2SAFE and store them in the repository
        Parameters:
        listDOToRetrieve - List of data objects to retrieve

      • deleteDO

        public DataObject deleteDO(DataObject dataObject)
        FOR TEST PURPOSE ONLY This method deletes a data object in EUDAT B2SAFE It must be used carefully as it can create a discrepancy between repository and replication On the B2SAFE side, a trigger manages the deletion of first replica PID record
        Parameters:
        dataObject - in this release, the DO to delete is identified by the fileName and the remoteDirPath

      • deleteAllRequestedDO

        See Also:
